mapper.sql:
FROM jsMember a
WHERE 1=1 AND a.delNy = #{shdelNy}
AND gender = 101 AND gender = 102
AND nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq ,a.nickname ,a.dob ,a.gender
,a.phoneAgency ,a.phoneNum ,a.email ,a.emailInsert ,a.emailDomain ,a.id ,a.password ,a.delNy ,a.registerDateTime ,a.modifyDateTime
order by a.seq DESC
SELECT seq ,nickname ,dob ,gender ,email ,id ,password ,delNy ,registerDateTime ,modifyDateTime FROM jsMember WHERE 1=1 AND seq=#{seq}
SELECT seq ,id FROM jsMember WHERE 1=1 AND id=#{id} AND delNy=0
SELECT seq ,id ,nickname FROM jsMember WHERE 1=1 AND id=#{id} AND password = #{password} AND delNy = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE jsMember SET delNy = 1 WHERE seq=#{seq}
